DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective interventional case series study report preoperative clinical anatomical factor associate visual recovery 1 year combine cataract idiopathic epiretinal membrane surgery . Age , duration symptom , preoperative best correct visual acuity appear reliable prognostic factor . Combining factor analysis photoreceptors ' inner outer segment junction spectral-domain optical coherence tomography provide predictive score estimate individual chance good visual recovery
DOC.criteria: symptomatic idiopathic epiretinal membrane operate April 2009 September 2012 university hospital Dijon , France . All patient sign informed consent surgical procedure . Patients exclude present cause secondary epiretinal membrane ( include diabetic retinopathy , vein occlusion , ocular inflammation , retinal detachment , previously vitrectomized eye ) , high myopia ( axial length ≥ 26 mm spherical equivalent ≥ 6 diopter ) , severe medium opacity weak SDOCT signal strength , macular optic nerve disease . Patients followup less 12 month exclude one eye include bilateral epiretinal membrane .
